divs: Sighting Details I was awakened by a car alarm sounding, after afew minutes went to close the window. I saw a blimp shaped object hovering tothe west. It had a row of lights bisecting object horizontally. The lightsBrigthened and dimmed and all changed color. The object started to move to thesouth, then it reversed course. It performed a couple of loops and kept movingnorth and south. I called and woke up my wife, she saw what I was looking at andaskes what that was? I couldnt say for sure. I got my binoculars and returnedto the window but object had moved further west, lights were still visible butdetail was lost.
Summary: blimp shaped aircraft spotted at night, unusal mov
trends: There has been one other sighting in Montgomery
There were no other sightings in Montgomery on or around January 21st 2001
